channel.title: Gcloud on Ashish's Site
channel.description: Recent content in Gcloud on Ashish's Site

item.title: Basics
item.author: iamashishsubedi@gmail.com (Ashish Subedi)
item.description: List all authenticated credentials (principals) gcloud auth list Make another account active gcloud config set account `ACCOUNT` Activate Service account (if new and no principals) gcloud auth activate-service-account --key-file=/path/to/key.json
